references.paper_title: Lower bounds for non-convex stochastic optimization
references.reason: This paper provides lower bounds for non-convex stochastic optimization, which helps to contextualize the optimality of the proposed algorithm in the paper.

This paper introduces the concept of recurrent neural networks, which are used in several applications mentioned in the paper and whose properties are important in determining the convergence properties of optimization algorithms.

references.paper_title: Momentum-based variance reduction in non-convex SGD
references.reason: This paper introduces momentum-based variance reduction techniques for non-convex optimization, which are used in the design and analysis of the proposed algorithm.
This paper provides foundational methods for solving bilevel optimization problems, which the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: A method of solving a convex programming problem with convergence rate o(1/k2)
references.reason: This paper introduces the Nesterov accelerated gradient method, a fundamental algorithm in optimization that is adapted and analyzed in the current paper.
